name: American Radish
description:
Experience the REAL struggles of fitting into American culture by assimilating yourself through participating in American activities and exploring the American town! 

     These fast-paced minigames will test your reactions and explore how American you really are. Travel from your home to school to downtown and experience life to the fullest, as long as each experience is less than a minute! 

     Be careful not to slip up though, because if you do your friends will figure out that you aren’t really American.
